ldmx::DummyAnalyzer

ldmx::DummyAnalyzer Class Reference

A dummy Analyzer implementation that just prints some messages and makes a simple histogram of calorimeter energy. More...

Detailed Description

A dummy Analyzer implementation that just prints some messages and makes a simple histogram of calorimeter energy.
